Last week the Minister for Health @CameronFriesen called the deaths in LTC homes “unavoidable”.  He could have started this week with an apology to the families he’s hurt with that false, callous and ageist statement.   He didn’t.   Manitobans deserve better.   #mbpoli

Last thing I'll say before I sleep: to anybody writing or talking about these issues...you have a responsibility to connect these dots. This is more than just people dying in LTC or disabled people not being given CERB.  What are we being shown/told by people in power?
